sentence.Network_en: North American orchid similar to Habenaria psycodes with larger paler flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 北美的一种兰花,和小紫玉凤花相似,但花更大、颜色略浅.

list.abs: 1. snowy serviceberrysnowy habenaria 雪白玉凤花sntadard heat of formation 标准形成热

means.word_mean: 1. chiefly terrestrial orchids with tubers or fleshy roots often having long slender spurs and petals and lip lobes; includes species formerly placed in genus Gymnadeniopsis
